    • Uses of Cis2Event in com.concordium.sdk.cis2.events

      Classes in com.concordium.sdk.cis2.events that implement Cis2Event 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BurnEvent
      An event emitted by a CIS2 compliant smart contract when one or more tokens have been burned.
      class  CustomEvent
      A custom event emitted from a CIS2 compliant contract.
      class  MintEvent
      An event emitted by a CIS2 compliant smart contract when one or more tokens have been minted.
      class  TokenMetadataEvent
      An event that is emitted by a CIS2 compliant contract when a particular token has its metadata url set.
      class  TransferEvent
      An event that is emitted from a CIS2 compliant contract when a token has been transferred.
      class  UpdateOperatorEvent
      An event that is emitted from a CIS2 compliant contract when the operator has been updated for a particular address.
